templates.title: Welcome To DDI {{driver.firstName}}!
templates.body: You have successfully completed your paperwork and are ready to become a {{client.driverTerm}} with {{client.name}}! templates.body: Your proof of current car insurance needs to be updated. To log into your {{client.driverTerm}} profile, please go to https://paperwork.ddiwork.com/drm/login.asp: Expiring: {{driver.insuranceExpirationDate}} Please update this information before {{driver.insuranceExpirationDate}} to avoid any delays in your paychecks.
